author: Staff Reporter
title: COVID 19: 535 beds and 125 ventilators ready to meet medical emergency in Vellore
description: Around 600 people are under home quarantine in the district
content:
535 beds in government and private hospitals and 125 ventilators are being readied in Vellore to meet medical emergency arising out of the spread of COVID-19.
The District Collector, A. Shanmuga Sundaram chaired a meeting of officials of government departmen… [+872 chars]
